description: Test table schema definition for Azure Log Analytics custom table

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: Timestamp when the log entry was generated

columns.name: Computer
columns.description: Name of the computer/host generating the log

columns.name: Level
columns.description: Log level (Info, Warning, Error, Debug, etc.)

columns.name: Source
columns.description: Source application or service generating the log

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: User identifier associated with the event

columns.name: ProcessName
columns.description: Name of the process generating the log

notes: TimeGenerated column is required for custom tables
Table names must end with '_CL' for custom tables
Column names cannot contain spaces or special characters except underscore
